column1: 1,Welcome to Java Tutorial 1,$This is the console,"In this tutorial, we are going to learn how to print out data to the console and declare and initialise variables as well as a selection of the data types available in Java."

column2: ,$Hello!,To print to the console, we use the following: System.out.print()
column3: . We enclose the data we want to print within the brackets. For now, we will use a String type - essentially text surrounded by double quotation marks"

column1: 4,Welcome to the Java Loops Tutorial,$This is the console,"In this tutorial, we are going to learn about some of the types of loop we can use in Java. Loops are a concept used for performing operations sequentially until a specified condition is met. We'll start by looking at for loops."
